name: Akairo No Kaii - 赤色の怪異
name_original: Akairo No Kaii - 赤色の怪異
description:
"Akairo No Kaii" is a Japanese-style horror game in which the main character is a student on his way home.

It has an adventure element in which the player solves a mystery by making full use of items.

The game is inspired by Japanese horror movies and offers a Japanese horror movie-like experience of escaping from ghosts, grudges, and other supposedly invisible fears.
The game is designed to make players feel that something is going to happen, that something is out there, or that something will come out.

Also, as the story progresses, the behavior of the enemies will change, and you will have to respond to them.



Genre: Psychological Horror, Japanese Horror

Style: This game was inspired by Japanese horror movies.

Play Style: First person

Save: You can continue from a certain point by reaching a certain point.

Ending: Three endings are available.

Game Streaming, Live Streaming: Possible
